scripts.dev: echo 'Java Spring Boot application - use npm run build to compile'
scripts.build: echo 'Building Java application...' && echo 'Note: This is a Java Spring Boot application. In a real environment, you would run: mvn spring-boot:run'
scripts.start: echo 'Starting Java application...' && echo 'Note: This is a Java Spring Boot application. In a real environment, you would run: mvn spring-boot:run'
